Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these daily news updates people discuss various topics ranging from the urgent need for a JobSeeker payment increase to a major rescue operation in the Western Australian coast. With ongoing debates on whether the central bank of New Zealand has done enough to avoid inflation and reports on a recent interest rate decision that influenced the Australian share market to close lower investors will remain wary. Also some people face the dilemma of selecting between buying important medications or paying for electricity further fueling the call for a higher JobSeeker payment rate in the upcoming Federal budget.
